backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, fields, and tasks with access control, including CRUD operations and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of summaries for all frontend source files describing components, hooks, dialogs, and styling behavior.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Comprehensive checklist for validating builds, deployments, login flow, and full app functionality in both production and local dev.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide for reproducing and diagnosing field creation failures, focusing on anonymous user behavior.
frontend/docs/production-redeploy-runboo: Runbook detailing steps and prerequisites for performing a clean production redeploy without adding new features.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-pro: Procedure for a post-deploy production smoke test covering critical path and minimal CRUD validation.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-res: Template file for recording results of production smoke tests across critical path and core functionality.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Documents the root cause, reproduction steps, fixes, and validation for a profile save failure caused by missing authentication and actor readiness guards.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading bootstrap and main scripts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication, actor/profile loading, boot error logic, and routing to login, profile setup, or dashboard.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Implements a pre-React boot error UI that shows sanitized startup errors with diagnostics and prevents duplicate displays.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Initializes global shims and environment variables before React loads and sets up boot fallback handlers.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Displays all tasks with search, sorting, field lookups, and loading states using data from task and field queries.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog component for creating a new field with name and background selection, handling authentication and backend readiness before submission.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Form dialog for creating a task with rating attributes, duration settings, and optional task dependencies.
Dialog for editing an existing field’s name, icon, color, and background, syncing initial values on open and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s attributes, duration, dependencies, and field assignment, including duration unit conversions.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Displays a field summary card showing its icon, name, task count, and averaged attributes with styling based on field appearance settings.
frontend/src/components/FieldDetailError: Error boundary that catches rendering errors in field detail views and shows a recovery UI with reset and back actions.
Displays detailed view of a field with task list filtering, sorting, and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting a field.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the top navigation bar with theme toggle and user profile menu including logout.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: Confirmation dialog that warns about overwriting data during import and shows item counts.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login card with feature list and Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting authenticated users to enter and save their profile name with validation states.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Shows an error screen with retry, logout, and expandable technical details including copy-to-clipboard.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Button component to toggle ascending/descending sort order with tooltip.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: React component displaying a task card with completion, deletion, editing, and attribute rendering logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, fields, tasks, and export actions using a resilient actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Hook that initializes a robust actor instance with retries and invalidates caches when identity changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with light/dark theme variables and custom field background color definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: React dashboard page that manages fields and tasks, including search, sorting, authentication state, and import/export dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Provides helpers to extract readable text from IC errors and detect specific conditions like missing profiles or stopped canisters.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Utility to serialize data to JSON, handle BigInt values, and trigger a file download.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Helpers for converting and formatting durations across minutes, hours, and days.
Normalizes export-data errors into user-friendly categories and messages.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines icon and color presets for fields and provides safe lookup functions with fallbacks.
Lists available field card background styles and utilities for retrieving them and their CSS variables.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field-creation errors into categories with safe, user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Validates and converts exported JSON into typed field and task objects, restoring Principals and BigInt values with defaults for older exports.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes backend and auth-related profile save errors into user-friendly categories and messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support and sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata file describing schema version, known issues, and request context for the current task.
